queryField.name: abstract
queryField.description: The full text of the abstract as provided in the science metadata document.

queryField.name: author
queryField.description: Principle Investigator (PI) / Author as listed in the metadata document.

queryField.name: authoritativeMN
queryField.description: The node Id of the authoritative Member Node for the object.

queryField.name: authorLastName
queryField.description: The LAST name(s) of the author(s)

queryField.name: beginDate
queryField.description: The starting date of the temporal range of the content described by the metadata document.

queryField.name: blockedReplicationMN
queryField.description: A multi-valued field that contains the node Ids of member nodes that are blocked from holding replicas of this object.

queryField.name: changePermission
queryField.description: List of subjects (groups and individuals) that have change permission on PID.

queryField.name: checksum
queryField.description: The checksum for the object

queryField.name: checksumAlgorithm
queryField.description: Algorithm used for generating the object checksum

queryField.name: class
queryField.description: Taxonomic class name(s)

queryField.name: contactOrganization
queryField.description: Name of the organization to contact for more information about the dataset

queryField.name: contactOrganizationText
queryField.description: Copy from contactOrganization

queryField.name: datasource
queryField.description: The node Id of the member node that originally contributed the content.

queryField.name: dataUrl
queryField.description: The URL that can be used to resolve the location of the object given its PID.

queryField.name: dateModified
queryField.description: The date and time when the object system metadata was last updated.

queryField.name: datePublished
queryField.description: Publication date for the dataset (this may or may not be coincident with when the content is added to DataONE).

queryField.name: dateUploaded
queryField.description: The date and time when the object was uploaded to the Member Node.

queryField.name: decade
queryField.description: The latest decade that is covered by the dataset, expressed in the form "1999-2009"

queryField.name: documents
queryField.description: Lists all PIDs that this object describes. Obtained by parsing all resource maps in which this object is referenced. Not set for data or resource map objects.

queryField.name: eastBoundCoord
queryField.description: Eastern most longitude of the spatial extent, in decimal degrees, WGS84

queryField.name: edition
queryField.description: The version or edition number of the item described.

queryField.name: endDate
queryField.description: The ending date of the temporal range of the content described by the metadata document.

queryField.name: family
queryField.description: Taxonomic family name(s)

queryField.name: fileID
queryField.description: Contains the `CNRead.resolve` URL for the object ONLY if the object is a science metadata object.

queryField.name: formatId
queryField.description: The format identifier indicating the type of content this record refers to.

queryField.name: gcmdKeyword
queryField.description: Keywords drawn from the GCMD controlled vocabulary

queryField.name: genus
queryField.description: Taxonomic genus name(s)

queryField.name: geoform
queryField.description: The name of the general form in which the item's geospatial data is presented

queryField.name: id
queryField.description: The identifier of the object being indexed.

queryField.name: identifier
queryField.description: Copy id

queryField.name: investigator
queryField.description: Name of the investigator(s) responsible for developing the dataset and associated content.

queryField.name: investigatorText
queryField.description: Copy from investigator.

queryField.name: isDocumentedBy
queryField.description: Lists all PIDs that describe this object. Obtained by parsing all resource maps in which this object is referenced.

queryField.name: isPublic
queryField.description: Set to True if the DataONE `public user` is present in the list of subjects with readPermission on PID.

queryField.name: isSpatial
queryField.description: Set to "Y" for records that contain spatial information

queryField.name: keyConcept
queryField.description: Terms drawn from a controlled vocabulary of concepts that are applicable to the content described by the metadata document.

queryField.name: keywords
queryField.description: Keywords recorded in the science metadata document. These may be controlled by the generator of the metadata or by the metadata standard of the document, but are effectively uncontrolled within the DataONE context.

queryField.name: keywordsText
queryField.description: Copy from keywords

queryField.name: kingdom
queryField.description: Taxonomic kingdom(s)

queryField.name: LTERSite
queryField.description: Data provider organization identifier, for sources within the LTER network.

queryField.name: namedLocation
queryField.description: The name of the location(s) relevant to the content described by the metadata document.

queryField.name: noBoundingBox
queryField.description: Set to "Y" if there is no bounding box information available (i.e., the east, west, north, south most coordinates)

queryField.name: northBoundCoord
queryField.description: Northern most latitude of the spatial extent, in decimal degrees, WGS84

queryField.name: numberReplicas
queryField.description: Requested number of replicas for the object

queryField.name: obsoletes
queryField.description: If set, indicates the object that this record obsoletes.

queryField.name: ogcUrl
queryField.description: URL for Open Geospatial Web service if available.

queryField.name: order
queryField.description: Taxonomic order name(s)

queryField.name: origin
queryField.description: Investigator or Investigator organization name.

queryField.name: originator
queryField.description: Investigator or Investigator organization name. Derived by normalizing origin.

queryField.name: originText
queryField.description: Copy from origin

queryField.name: parameter
queryField.description: A characteristic, or variable, that is measured or derived as part of data-collection activities.

queryField.name: parameterText
queryField.description: Copy from parameter

queryField.name: phylum
queryField.description: Taxonomic phylum (or division) name(s)

queryField.name: placeKey
queryField.description: A place name keyword, assigned by the metadata creator. It is one keyword from the thesaurus named in <placekt>

queryField.name: preferredReplicationMN
queryField.description: A list of member node identifiers that are preferred replication targets for this object.

queryField.name: presentationCat
queryField.description: Type of data being preserved (maps, text, etc.)

queryField.name: project
queryField.description: The authorized name of a research effort for which data is collected. This name is often reduced to a convenient abbreviation or acronym. All investigators involved in a project should use a common, agreed-upon name.

queryField.name: projectText
queryField.description: Copy from project

queryField.name: pubDate
queryField.description: Publication date for the dataset (this may or may not be coincident with when the content is added to DataONE).

queryField.name: purpose
queryField.description: The "Purpose" describes the "why" aspects of the data set (For example, why was the data set created?).

queryField.name: readPermission
queryField.description: List of subjects (groups and individuals) that have read permission on PID.

queryField.name: replicaMN
queryField.description: One or more node Ids holding copies of the object.

queryField.name: replicationAllowed
queryField.description: True if this object can be replicated.

queryField.name: resourceMap
queryField.description: List of resource map PIDs that reference this PID.

queryField.name: rightsHolder
queryField.description: The `Subject` that acts as the rights holder for the object.

queryField.name: scientificName
queryField.description: Taxonomic scientific name(s) at the most precise level available for the organisms of relevance to the dataset

queryField.name: sensor
queryField.description: Also called "instrument." A device that is used for collecting data for a data set.

queryField.name: sensorText
queryField.description: Copy from sensor.

queryField.name: site
queryField.description: The name or description of the physical location where the data were collected

queryField.name: siteText
queryField.description: Copy from site.

queryField.name: size
queryField.description: The size of the object, in bytes.

queryField.name: sku
queryField.description: Copy from id.

queryField.name: source
queryField.description: Also called "platform." The mechanism used to support the sensor or instrument that gathers data

queryField.name: sourceText
queryField.description: Copy from source.

queryField.name: southBoundCoord
queryField.description: Southern most latitude of the spatial extent, in decimal degrees, WGS84

queryField.name: species
queryField.description: Taxonomic species name(s)

queryField.name: submitter
queryField.description: The `Subject` name of the original submitter of the content to DataONE.

queryField.name: term
queryField.description: A secondary subject area within which parameters can be categorized. Approved terms include "agricultural chemicals" and "atmospheric chemistry," among many others. When entering a term in the LandVal Metadata Editor, users should select a standard expression from the pick list for terms if at all possible.

queryField.name: termText
queryField.description: Copy from term.

queryField.name: text
queryField.description: Full text of the metadata record, used to support full text searches

queryField.name: title
queryField.description: Title of the dataset as recorded in the science metadata.

queryField.name: titlestr
queryField.description: Copy from title.

queryField.name: topic
queryField.description: The most general subject area within which a parameter is categorized. Approved topics include "agriculture," "atmosphere," and "hydrosphere," among others.

queryField.name: topicText
queryField.description: Copy from topic.

queryField.name: updateDate
queryField.description: Copy from dateuploaded.

queryField.name: webUrl
queryField.description: Link to the investigator's web-site.

queryField.name: westBoundCoord
queryField.description: Western most longitude of the spatial extent, in decimal degrees, WGS84

queryField.name: writePermission
queryField.description: List of subjects (groups and individuals) that have write permission on PID.
